description: Helps Content Marketers draft content pieces more efficiently while maintaining brand voice and editorial standards. Creates outlines, briefs, summaries, and first drafts based on organizational templates and guidelines.

friction_addressed.description: Creating new content pieces from scratch when similar content exists; repetitive drafting of similar content types
Compiling performance data from multiple sources into coherent reports; manual metric gathering

capabilities: Draft blog post outlines following organizational templates
Create content briefs for writers and contributors
Generate social media post variations in brand voice
Draft newsletter sections and email copy
Generate meta descriptions and SEO elements

output_types.description: Structured outline for blog posts with headers, key points, and CTA suggestions
Writer brief including target keyword, audience, outline, and requirements
Email newsletter sections with subject line options
Content performance report with key metrics and insights
SEO meta descriptions, titles, and page elements

data_sources.name: Brand Guidelines
data_sources.description: Style guide, brand voice documentation, messaging framework

data_sources.name: Content Templates
data_sources.description: Blog templates, brief templates, format guides

data_sources.name: Content Library
data_sources.description: Published content for reference and context

example_queries: Create a blog outline about content marketing ROI
Draft a content brief for an ebook on customer success
Write social media posts for our new blog about SEO trends
Create a newsletter section summarizing this month's content
Draft a quarterly content performance summary
Generate meta descriptions for these three blog posts
Create a repurposing plan for our webinar recording
guardrails: All output is marked as DRAFT requiring human review
Uses only approved brand voice and messaging from organizational guidelines
Does not invent statistics, quotes, or factual claims
Cites source documents when referencing existing content
Flags when brand guidelines may be missing or unclear
Does not publish or distribute content - drafting only
Indicates areas requiring SME input or verification
out_of_scope: Writing customer-facing legal or compliance content
success_metrics: Reduction in time from idea to first draft
Reduced revision cycles from better first drafts
